prompt_text: Every day at 5:00 PM, turn on the Office WLED to 80%, wait 1 minute, turn on all living room lights to 60%, wait 30 seconds, and dim the Office WLED to 40%
automation_yaml:
id: 'office_living_room_evening_sequence'
alias: '17:00 Office and Living Room Lighting Sequence'
description: "Every day at 5:00 PM, brighten the Office WLED to 80%, wait 1 minute, then turn on the Living Room light to 60%, wait 30 seconds, and finally dim the Office WLED down to 40%."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time
    at: '17:00:00'
conditions: []
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id:
        - light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 80
  - delay: '00:01:00'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id:
        - light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness_pct: 60
  - delay: '00:00:30'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id:
        - light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 40

questions.question_text: Which device did you mean? Device 'lights' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: living_room, office, living
Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: brighten
